title: Joan is Awful
description: Joan is about to have her life turned upside down when the details of her private life are broadcast to the world.
quote: She uses the same toothpaste as you.
altHero: Annie Murphy as Joan, dressed in a cheerleader uniform and getting her mugshot taken
alt1: Joan and her fiance upset on their couch
alt2: Joan interrupting a wedding in her cheerleader uniform, pigtails, and a penis drawn on her forehead
alt4: Joan holding an axe up to a futuristic machine
